item.title: Marketing & Training
item.description: I’m passionate in educational design, capacity building and helping individuals and organizations grow. My specialization is in Inbound Marketing and related fields. Inbound Marketing (Digital Marketing Strategy) Inbound Marketing is a set of proven marketing strategies that brings together branding, content marketing, first-party data collection, and marketing technology. Itâ€™s been a secret sauce of how I acquired and retain customers of my businesses, as well as providing the service to my clients.

item.title: Venture Building
item.description: As a seasoned entrepreneur, I’ve played a pivotal role in the founding and growth of several successful ventures across diverse industries. My portfolio includes experiences in media & publication, education, digital marketing services, and e-commerce products. One of my most notable accomplishments is the development of “Content Shifu,” a leading digital marketing media, education, and ecosystem builder. From its inception, I spearheaded its growth into a thriving company that has established a strong presence in the market.

item.title: Welcome to My Portfolio
item.description: A passionate professional with experience at the intersection of entrepreneurship, marketing, education and social innovation. I recently completed a Master degree in Public Policy & Management at Carnegie Mellon University. Prior to that, I have 10 years of experience in the online content and marketing industries, as well as 7+ years as an entrepreneur, consultant and educator and have educated over 3,000 professionals. Skills and Experience Product discovery and venture building read more about them Strategic Marketing and Consulting Event & media relations Education & Community Empowerment Responsible Technology & Policy This page is still a work in progress Want to explore more or see more details?
